Package mireka.transmission

Provides the reliable transmission service API and the corresponding Transmit filter.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MailSystemStatus This interface represents an SMTP status, which is returned by a remote MTA in a response, or generated locally.
Transmitter A reliable (as specified by SMTP) mail transmitting service.
 

Class Summary
EnhancedStatus These class represents an SMTP status which includes enhanced status code.
Mail An SMTP mail object, which contains both an envelope and content.
Transmit This filter class asynchronously transmits the mail which is currently received using the configured transmitter.
 

Enum Summary
EnhancedStatus.StatusClass  
 

Exception Summary
LocalMailSystemException Signals a failure within the scope of this installation, in which the SMTP protocol is not involved.
 

Package mireka.transmission Description

Provides the reliable transmission service API and the corresponding Transmit filter.
